about.zuugle_erklaerung_1: Zuugle is a search engine for hikes, which are reachable via public transportation.
about.zuugle_erklaerung_2: Zuugle offers the unique possibility to search for mountain tours and to directly consider the journey by public transport. Zuugle searches - according to predefined criteria - for available mountain tours on the internet and filters to those that are accessible by public transport. Since most tours do not start and end directly at a stop, Zuugle also displays these footpaths as access and return.
about.wie_und_wofuer: HOW AND WHAT FOR CAN I USE ZUUGLE?
about.entwicklung_von_zuugle_1: When developing Zuugle, we placed particular emphasis on ease of use and clear presentation, so that you can find the right hikes for you with just a few clicks.
about.entwicklung_von_zuugle_2: Since Zuugle is a search engine, you will of course find a search bar on the homepage. This is divided into two parts: In the left part, you can enter the place from which you want to travel. In the right, optional part of the search bar, you can search specifically for mountain groups, sports or certain search words (e.g. "Gastein" or "Wachau"). Now display the results for your search.
about.entwicklung_von_zuugle_3: On the results page, you can further refine your search with various filters, e.g. regarding arrival time, degree of difficulty, altitude metres and much more. In this way, you will find the tour that suits your current wishes.
about.entwicklung_von_zuugle_4: Now click on your desired tour. A tour description will appear on your screen, which you can also download as a PDF. For the Zuugle timetable suggestions for the next 7 days, click on the "Arrival & Departure" tab. Zuugle selects the best outward journey and shows you several return options.
about.entwicklung_von_zuugle_5: Please note that train cancellations or timetable changes at short notice may not be taken into account by our timetable suggestions. Therefore, please check your connection with the respective operators (bahn.de, oebb.at) before starting your journey. Click on the button of the tour portal to open a new window with the detailed tour description in the respective portal.

impressum.non_profit_org1: "Bahn zum Berg" is a non-profit organisation that promotes travel to outdoor activities by public transport. We do this by operating the platforms www.bahn-zum-berg.at and www.zuugle.at.
impressum.non_profit_org2: For more details please visit our homepage www.bahnzumberg.at
impressum.beschreibungen_fotos: The descriptions and photos of the individual mountain tours come from the respective linked tour portals. All information is provided without guarantee and "Bahn zum Berg" accepts no liability for its accuracy. The use of all content on this portal is therefore at your own risk and responsibility.
impressum.verknuepfung_links: This Öffi-Tour search engine contains links to third-party websites ("external links"). These websites are subject to the liability of the respective operators. When we first created the external links to the third-party content, we checked whether there were any legal violations. At the time in question, no legal violations were apparent. However, we have no influence whatsoever on the current and future design and content of the linked pages. The inclusion of external links does not imply that we adopt the content behind the link as our own. Due to the large number of external links, it is not reasonable for us to constantly monitor them without concrete indications of legal violations. However, we will delete such external links immediately if we become aware of any legal violations.
impressum.anfuehrung_quellen: The various sources and licence conditions of the timetable data used are listed here.

privacy.datenschutz_ist_uns_wichtig: Data protection is important to us. Therefore, we have avoid many options that are technically possible but would invade the privacy of our visitors.
privacy.welche_personenbezogenen_daten: WHAT PERSONAL DATA OF YOURS WE COLLECT AND WHY
privacy.keine_personenbezogenen_daten: We do not collect any personal data.
privacy.matomo_1: We use the open source software
privacy.matomo_2: in the self-hosted variant. The data is therefore located on a server in Germany in the EU
privacy.abgespeichert_werden: The name of the website accessed, the time and the first two segments of the IP address are stored. It is not possible to track a specific person with this considerate approach.
privacy.cookies_erklaerung1: A cookie is set by Zuugle so that the visitor does not have to re-enter the starting location each time.
privacy.cookies_erklaerung2: By using the site, consent is given to the use of cookies, as for technical reasons the function can only be made available by using this cookie.
privacy.mit_wem_daten_teilen: WITH WHOM WE SHARE YOUR DATA
privacy.wie_lange_daten_speichern: HOW LONG WE STORE YOUR DATA
privacy.cookie_verfall_drei_monate: After 3 months the cookie on your computer will expire.
privacy.welche_rechte: WHAT RIGHTS YOU HAVE OVER YOUR DATA
privacy.nichts_von_dir_abspeichern: Since we don't store anything from you, we can't export or delete anything for you.

start.wartungsmodus: Zuugle is currently in maintenance mode. Please check back later.

start.zuugle_sucht_fuer_dich_2: portals to find all hikes which are reachable via public transportation
start.schoene_wanderungen_nahe: The most beautiful hiking destinations near you
start.entdecke_bergtouren: Discover all mountain tours in the Alps using train & bus
start.oeffentliche_erreichbarkeit: We guarantee that all hikes can be reached via public transportation
start.ziel_von_zuugle: The aim of Zuugle is to make visible all hikes in the Alps that are reachable by train and bus.
start.weil_es_braucht_kein_auto: Because: You don't need a car to get to nature. We will gladly tell you how.
start.jetzt_oeffitour_suchen: Search for hikes reachable with public transportation
start.helmet_title: Zuugle - the search engine for public transport mountain tours

main.direkt_bei_der_haltestelle: Start directly at railway or bus stop

filter.ueberschreitungen: Tour start and tour end are different stops
filter.schwierigkeitswert: The difficulty value has been consolidated according to the difficulty scales on the various tour portals and can be 'easy', 'medium' or 'difficult'.
filter.tourstart_ende_andere_stops: Tour start and tour end are different stops

index.zuugle_description: Zuugle shows you verified connections by train and bus to mountain tours, hikes, ski tours, snowshoe hikes, etc. which you can reach from your residence.
index.no_javascript: It seems that you do not have Javascript enabled. However, this search engine for public transport mountain tours requires Javascript to work. Please enable Javascript in your browser.
